cookingTips: Keep ingredients cold by using room temperature sausage mixed minimally with biscuit mix for fluffier balls
Use your hands to combine ingredients until just mixed; don't overwork the dough
Bake at 350°F for 15-20 minutes until golden and cooked through
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me the easiest method to make simple, three-ingredient sausage balls that are perfect for quick appetizers.
